userPromptForThisRevision: website for my cat cafe in paris, Kitten Kaboodle

imageAssets.description: A captivating, wide hero image for a Parisian cat cafe named 'Kitten Kaboodle'. The scene should be a sun-drenched, cozy cafe interior. Several adorable, diverse cats (e.g., a ginger tabby, a calico, a black cat) are lounging comfortably on plush velvet chairs or by a window overlooking a charming Parisian street (subtle Haussmannian architecture visible). Sunlight streams in. Overall mood: Warm, inviting, whimsical, and chic. Style: Photorealistic with a soft, slightly dreamy quality. Dominant colors: Light creams, soft pastels (like blush pink or mint green), warm wood tones, with accents of soft coral (#FF6B6B). Avoid clutter. No text on image.
imageAssets.purpose: Main hero banner for the website homepage (background of #home section). Will be named something like `hero_image_kitten_kaboodle.png`.

imageAssets.description: An inviting, well-lit interior shot of the Kitten Kaboodle cat cafe for the 'About Us' section. Focus on a clean, stylish, and comfortable atmosphere. Show a couple of cozy armchairs, a small bookshelf with books and cat toys, and perhaps a glimpse of a coffee bar. A cat can be subtly present, perhaps curled on a chair. Lighting: Bright, natural, airy. Style: Photorealistic, warm, professional, and inviting. Colors: Light and airy, consistent with the light theme and soft coral accents.
imageAssets.purpose: Image for the 'About Us' section (`#aboutImage`). Will be named something like `about_us_cafe_interior.png`.

imageAssets.description: Charming portrait of a healthy, photogenic ginger tabby cat named 'Léo'. Léo should look curious and friendly, perhaps with a slight head tilt. Background: Softly blurred cafe interior, highlighting Léo. Style: High-quality pet photography, sharp focus on the cat. Colors: Vibrant ginger fur, bright eyes (e.g., green or yellow), warm background tones.
imageAssets.purpose: Profile picture for 'Léo' in 'Meet Our Cats' section. Will be named `cat_leo.png`.

imageAssets.description: Elegant portrait of a beautiful calico cat named 'Chloé'. Chloé could be gracefully grooming a paw or looking serenely at the camera. Background: A comfortable cushion or a sunlit spot in the cafe, softly blurred. Style: High-quality pet photography, capturing a calm and gentle demeanor. Colors: Distinct calico patches (white, black, orange/cream), soft, light background.
imageAssets.purpose: Profile picture for 'Chloé' in 'Meet Our Cats' section. Will be named `cat_chloe.png`.

imageAssets.description: Striking portrait of a sleek black cat named 'Noir', with captivating bright eyes (e.g., yellow or green). Noir could be playfully peeking out from behind a plant or a stack of books, adding a touch of mystery. Background: Cafe interior elements, softly blurred. Style: High-quality pet photography, emphasizing the cat's glossy fur and expressive eyes. Colors: Deep black fur, contrasting bright eyes, subtle background colors.
imageAssets.purpose: Profile picture for 'Noir' in 'Meet Our Cats' section. Will be named `cat_noir.png`.

imageAssets.description: An appetizing flat lay or close-up shot of delicious Parisian pastries (e.g., flaky croissants, colorful macarons, a slice of fruit tart) and a beautifully prepared cup of coffee with latte art (perhaps a subtle cat paw print). Arranged elegantly on a rustic wooden cafe table. Style: Bright, vibrant food photography, photorealistic. Colors: Warm browns of pastries, rich coffee color, colorful fruit/macarons, against a textured table surface.
imageAssets.purpose: Image for the Gallery section, showcasing food offerings. Will be named `gallery_food_1.png`.

imageAssets.description: A heartwarming, candid-style photograph of a person (face not prominent or out of focus) gently interacting with a happy, relaxed cat in the Kitten Kaboodle cafe. Could be someone petting a cat on their lap or a cat rubbing against a leg. Focus on the positive, gentle connection. Style: Lifestyle photography, warm, emotional, natural lighting, photorealistic. Colors: Soft, natural tones, consistent with cafe ambiance.
imageAssets.purpose: Image for the Gallery, showing positive customer-cat interaction. Will be named `gallery_interaction_1.png`.

imageAssets.description: A wider shot of the Kitten Kaboodle cafe ambiance, showing a few different cats in various relaxed poses (one sleeping in a basket, another watching birds from a window perch, one strolling). Include some blurred human figures enjoying the cafe to give a sense of life. Emphasize the clean, spacious, and cat-friendly design of the environment (climbing structures, cozy beds). Style: Photorealistic, inviting, atmospheric. Colors: Light and bright, with warm accents, reflecting the overall theme.
imageAssets.purpose: Image for the Gallery, showcasing overall cafe atmosphere and cat-friendly features. Will be named `gallery_ambiance_1.png`.
